name: Breathe (itch) (thiw01)
description:
"Breathe"

Teens nowadays are under a tremendous amount of pressure to perform, succeed and make important life choices. Focusing on too many aspects in life can be overwhelming and exhausting. Sometimes it's important to just Breathe.

Created by :

Marcos S. López - Designer (Modern Philosopher)

Tiffani Trogi - 2D Artist (Sass Master)

Emery Monzerol - Programmer (One Pun Man)

Marc-André De Blois - Designer/Sound Design (Captain Shit Talk)
